prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a sleek, slender alien overlord, smooth white bio-armor plating, crystalline purple head and shoulder gems, intense menacing red eyes, menacing presence, slender tail visible
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, hyperrealistic polished surface texture on armor, high-gloss reflections, volumetric rim lighting emphasizing the smooth form, sharp focus on the crystalline details
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, dull surface, matte skin, fleshy texture, human proportions, bulky, flat lighting, low quality, blurry details
